sqlMap.sql: SELECT ADV.ADV_ID ADVID , ADV.MST_LAW_ID MSTLAWID , TPL.OPT_TIME_YEAR OPTTIMEYEAR , TPL.OPT_TIME_HALF OPTTIMEHALF , ADV.ADV_NO ADVNO , ADV.MNG_ORG_CD MNGORGCD , ORG.ORG_NM MNGORGNM , ORG.FULL_ORG_NM FULLMNGORGNM , ADV.CHK_ORG_NM CHKORGNM , ADV.CHK_NM CHKNM , nvl(ADV.CNT_JUDICIAL_ACT, 0) + nvl(ADV.CNT_STOP_USE, 0) + nvl(ADV.CNT_CORRECT_ORDER, 0) + nvl(ADV.CNT_CORRECT_INSTRUCT, 0) + nvl(ADV.CNT_FINE, 0) + nvl(ADV.CNT_RECMD, 0) + nvl(ADV.CNT_ETC, 0) CNTTOTALVIOLATION , nvl(ADV.CNT_JUDICIAL_ACT, 0) CNTJUDICIALACT , nvl(ADV.CNT_STOP_USE, 0) CNTSTOPUSE , nvl(ADV.CNT_STOP_FACILITY_TOTAL, 0) CNTSTOPFACILITYTOTAL , nvl(ADV.CNT_CORRECT_ORDER, 0) CNTCORRECTORDER , nvl(ADV.CNT_CORRECT_INSTRUCT, 0) CNTCORRECTINSTRUCT , nvl(ADV.CNT_FINE, 0) CNTFINE , nvl(ADV.AMT_FINE_TOTAL, 0) AMTFINETOTAL , nvl(ADV.CNT_RECMD, 0) CNTRECMD , nvl(ADV.CNT_ETC, 0) CNTETC , TO_CHAR(ADV.CHK_DT, 'YYYY-MM-DD') CHKDT , nvl(ADV.EVD_FILE_ID, 0) EVDFILEID
FROM TB_EXT_ORG_ADV ADV JOIN TB_MST_LAW_TPL TPL ON ADV.MST_LAW_ID = TPL.MST_LAW_ID JOIN TB_ORG ORG ON ADV.MNG_ORG_CD = ORG.ORG_CD AND ADV.MST_LAW_ID = ORG.MST_LAW_ID

WHERE ADV.MST_LAW_ID = ( SELECT MST_LAW_ID FROM TB_MST_LAW_TPL WHERE OPT_TIME_YEAR = #optTimeYear# AND OPT_TIME_HALF = #optTimeHalf# )
AND TO_DATE(ADV.CHK_DT) = TO_DATE(#chkDt#, 'YYYY-MM-DD')
sqlMap.select: ORDER BY TPL.OPT_TIME_YEAR DESC , DECODE(TPL.OPT_TIME_HALF, 'F', 1, 'S', 2, 0) DESC , ADV.ADV_ID DESC
sqlMap.insert:
SELECT ADVID.NEXTVAL FROM DUAL
INSERT INTO TB_EXT_ORG_ADV ( ADV_ID , MST_LAW_ID , ADV_NO , MNG_ORG_CD , CHK_ORG_NM , CHK_NM
, CNT_JUDICIAL_ACT , CNT_STOP_USE , CNT_STOP_FACILITY_TOTAL , CNT_CORRECT_ORDER , CNT_CORRECT_INSTRUCT , CNT_FINE , AMT_FINE_TOTAL , CNT_RECMD , CNT_ETC , CHK_DT , EVD_FILE_ID ) VALUES ( #advId# , (SELECT MST_LAW_ID FROM TB_MST_LAW_TPL WHERE OPT_TIME_YEAR = #optTimeYear# AND OPT_TIME_HALF = #optTimeHalf#) , #advNo# , #mngOrgCd# , #chkOrgNm# , #chkNm#
, 0 , 0 , 0 , 0 , 0 , 0 , 0 , 0 , 0 , TO_DATE(#chkDt#, 'YYYY-MM-DD') , #evdFileId# )
sqlMap.update:
UPDATE TB_EXT_ORG_ADV SET ADV_ID = ADV_ID
, CHK_ORG_NM = #chkOrgNm#
, CHK_NM = #chkNm#
, CHK_DT = TO_DATE(#chkDt#, 'YYYY-MM-DD')
WHERE ADV_ID = #advId#

UPDATE TB_EXT_ORG_ADV SET ADV_ID = ADV_ID , CNT_JUDICIAL_ACT = CNT_JUDICIAL_ACT + #cntJudicialAct# , CNT_STOP_USE = CNT_STOP_USE + #cntStopUse# , CNT_STOP_FACILITY_TOTAL = CNT_STOP_FACILITY_TOTAL + #cntStopFacilityTotal# , CNT_CORRECT_ORDER = CNT_CORRECT_ORDER + #cntCorrectOrder# , CNT_CORRECT_INSTRUCT = CNT_CORRECT_INSTRUCT + #cntCorrectInstruct# , CNT_FINE = CNT_FINE + #cntFine# , AMT_FINE_TOTAL = AMT_FINE_TOTAL + #amtFineTotal# , CNT_RECMD = CNT_RECMD + #cntRecmd# , CNT_ETC = CNT_ETC + #cntEtc# WHERE ADV_ID = #advId#
sqlMap.sql: SELECT DTL.ADV_DTL_ID ADVDTLID , NVL(DTL.ADV_DTL_SN, 0) ADVDTLSN , DTL.ADM_CD ADMCD , FN_CODENM('ADMCLS', DTL.ADM_CD) ADMCDNM , NVL(DTL.CNT_STOP_FACILITY, 0) CNTSTOPFACILITY , DTL.AMT_FINE AMTFINE , DTL.ADV_DTL_TEXT ADVDTLTEXT , DTL.IMPR_PLAN IMPRPLAN , DTL.IMPR_RST IMPRRST , DTL.ORG_CD ORGCD , ORG.ORG_NM ORGNM , ORG.FULL_ORG_NM FULLORGNM , DTL.MST_LAW_ID MSTLAWID , DTL.BEF_FILE_ID BEFFILEID , DTL.AFT_FILE_ID AFTFILEID , DTL.ADV_ID ADVID
FROM TB_EXT_ORG_ADV_DTL DTL JOIN TB_ORG ORG ON DTL.ORG_CD = ORG.ORG_CD AND DTL.MST_LAW_ID = ORG.MST_LAW_ID

WHERE DTL.ADV_ID = #advId#
AND DTL.ADM_CD = #admCd#
AND ORG.FULL_ORG_NM LIKE '%' || #orgNm# || '%'
AND DTL.ADV_DTL_TEXT LIKE '%' || #advDtlText# || '%'
sqlMap.select: WHERE ADV_DTL_ID = #advDtlId# ORDER BY ADV_DTL_ID DESC
sqlMap.insert:
SELECT ADVDTLID.NEXTVAL FROM DUAL
INSERT INTO TB_EXT_ORG_ADV_DTL ( ADV_DTL_ID , ADV_DTL_SN , ADM_CD , CNT_STOP_FACILITY , AMT_FINE , ADV_DTL_TEXT , IMPR_PLAN , IMPR_RST , ORG_CD , MST_LAW_ID , BEF_FILE_ID , AFT_FILE_ID , ADV_ID ) VALUES ( #advDtlId# , (SELECT NVL(MAX(ADV_DTL_SN), 1) FROM TB_EXT_ORG_ADV_DTL WHERE ADV_ID = #advId#) , #admCd# , #cntStopFacility# , #amtFine# , #advDtlText# , #imprPlan# , #imprRst# , #orgCd# , #mstLawId# , #befFileId# , #aftFileId# , #advId# )
sqlMap.update:
UPDATE TB_EXT_ORG_ADV_DTL SET ADV_DTL_ID = ADV_DTL_ID
, ADM_CD = #admCd#
, CNT_STOP_FACILITY = #cntStopFacility#
, AMT_FINE = #amtFine#
, ADV_DTL_TEXT = #advDtlText#
, IMPR_PLAN = #imprPlan#
, IMPR_RST = #imprRst#
, ORG_CD = #orgCd#
WHERE ADV_DTL_ID = #advDtlId#
sqlMap.sql: SELECT ORG_CD , CONNECT_BY_ROOT ORG_CD AS ROOT FROM TB_ORG WHERE MST_LAW_ID = ( SELECT MST_LAW_ID FROM TB_MST_LAW_TPL WHERE OPT_TIME_YEAR = #optTimeYear# AND OPT_TIME_HALF = #optTimeHalf# ) AND FIRST_ORG_CD <> 'A000' AND FIRST_ORG_CD NOT IN ( SELECT ORG_CD FROM TB_ORG WHERE MST_LAW_ID = ( SELECT MST_LAW_ID FROM TB_MST_LAW_TPL WHERE OPT_TIME_YEAR = #optTimeYear# AND OPT_TIME_HALF = #optTimeHalf# ) AND PARENT_ORG_CD = 'A000' ) CONNECT BY PRIOR ORG_CD = PARENT_ORG_CD START WITH ORG_CD = '0000' UNION SELECT ORG_CD , CONNECT_BY_ROOT ORG_CD AS ROOT FROM TB_ORG WHERE MST_LAW_ID = ( SELECT MST_LAW_ID FROM TB_MST_LAW_TPL WHERE OPT_TIME_YEAR = #optTimeYear# AND OPT_TIME_HALF = #optTimeHalf# ) CONNECT BY PRIOR ORG_CD = PARENT_ORG_CD START WITH PARENT_ORG_CD = 'A000'

SELECT * FROM ( SELECT ORG_CD , CONNECT_BY_ROOT ORG_CD AS ROOT FROM TB_ORG WHERE MST_LAW_ID = ( SELECT MST_LAW_ID FROM TB_MST_LAW_TPL WHERE OPT_TIME_YEAR = #optTimeYear# AND OPT_TIME_HALF = 'F' ) AND FIRST_ORG_CD <> 'A000' AND FIRST_ORG_CD NOT IN ( SELECT ORG_CD FROM TB_ORG WHERE MST_LAW_ID = ( SELECT MST_LAW_ID FROM TB_MST_LAW_TPL WHERE OPT_TIME_YEAR = #optTimeYear# AND OPT_TIME_HALF = 'F' ) AND PARENT_ORG_CD = 'A000' ) CONNECT BY PRIOR ORG_CD = PARENT_ORG_CD START WITH ORG_CD = '0000' UNION SELECT ORG_CD , CONNECT_BY_ROOT ORG_CD AS ROOT FROM TB_ORG WHERE MST_LAW_ID = ( SELECT MST_LAW_ID FROM TB_MST_LAW_TPL WHERE OPT_TIME_YEAR = #optTimeYear# AND OPT_TIME_HALF = 'F' ) CONNECT BY PRIOR ORG_CD = PARENT_ORG_CD START WITH PARENT_ORG_CD = 'A000' ) UNION SELECT * FROM ( SELECT ORG_CD , CONNECT_BY_ROOT ORG_CD AS ROOT FROM TB_ORG WHERE MST_LAW_ID = ( SELECT MST_LAW_ID FROM TB_MST_LAW_TPL WHERE OPT_TIME_YEAR = #optTimeYear# AND OPT_TIME_HALF = 'S' ) AND FIRST_ORG_CD <> 'A000' AND FIRST_ORG_CD NOT IN ( SELECT ORG_CD FROM TB_ORG WHERE MST_LAW_ID = ( SELECT MST_LAW_ID FROM TB_MST_LAW_TPL WHERE OPT_TIME_YEAR = #optTimeYear# AND OPT_TIME_HALF = 'S' ) AND PARENT_ORG_CD = 'A000' ) CONNECT BY PRIOR ORG_CD = PARENT_ORG_CD START WITH ORG_CD = '0000' UNION SELECT ORG_CD , CONNECT_BY_ROOT ORG_CD AS ROOT FROM TB_ORG WHERE MST_LAW_ID = ( SELECT MST_LAW_ID FROM TB_MST_LAW_TPL WHERE OPT_TIME_YEAR = #optTimeYear# AND OPT_TIME_HALF = 'S' ) CONNECT BY PRIOR ORG_CD = PARENT_ORG_CD START WITH PARENT_ORG_CD = 'A000' )

SELECT '0000' ORG_CD , '본사' ORG_NM , '01000000000000' ORG_ORDER_CD , 1 ORG_RANK FROM DUAL UNION SELECT ORG_CD , ORG_NM , ORG_ORDER_CD , ORG_RANK FROM TB_ORG WHERE MST_LAW_ID = ( SELECT MST_LAW_ID FROM TB_MST_LAW_TPL WHERE OPT_TIME_YEAR = #optTimeYear# AND OPT_TIME_HALF = #optTimeHalf# ) AND PARENT_ORG_CD = 'A000'

SELECT '0000' ORG_CD , '본사' ORG_NM , '01000000000000' ORG_ORDER_CD , 1 ORG_RANK FROM DUAL UNION SELECT MRG.ORG_CD , DECODE(SSS.ORG_NM, NULL, SSF.ORG_NM, SSS.ORG_NM) ORG_NM , DECODE( SSS.ORG_ORDER_CD, NULL, SSF.ORG_ORDER_CD, SSS.ORG_ORDER_CD ) ORG_ORDER_CD , DECODE(SSS.ORG_RANK, NULL, SSF.ORG_RANK, SSS.ORG_RANK) ORG_RANK FROM ( SELECT DISTINCT ORG_CD FROM TB_ORG WHERE MST_LAW_ID IN ( SELECT MST_LAW_ID FROM TB_MST_LAW_TPL WHERE OPT_TIME_YEAR = #optTimeYear# ) AND PARENT_ORG_CD = 'A000' ) MRG LEFT OUTER JOIN ( SELECT ORG_CD , ORG_NM , ORG_ORDER_CD , 'F' OPT_TIME_HALF , ORG_RANK FROM TB_ORG WHERE MST_LAW_ID IN ( SELECT MST_LAW_ID FROM TB_MST_LAW_TPL WHERE OPT_TIME_YEAR = #optTimeYear# AND OPT_TIME_HALF = 'F' ) AND PARENT_ORG_CD = 'A000' ) SSF ON MRG.ORG_CD = SSF.ORG_CD FULL OUTER JOIN ( SELECT ORG_CD , ORG_NM , ORG_ORDER_CD , 'S' OPT_TIME_HALF , ORG_RANK FROM TB_ORG WHERE MST_LAW_ID IN ( SELECT MST_LAW_ID FROM TB_MST_LAW_TPL WHERE OPT_TIME_YEAR = #optTimeYear# AND OPT_TIME_HALF = 'S' ) AND PARENT_ORG_CD = 'A000' ) SSS ON MRG.ORG_CD = SSS.ORG_CD
sqlMap.select: SELECT ADV_ID advId , MST_LAW_ID mstLawId , ADV_NO advNo , MNG_ORG_CD mngOrgCd , CHK_ORG_NM chkOrgNm , CHK_NM chkNm , CHK_DT chkDt , CNT_JUDICIAL_ACT cntJudicialAct , CNT_STOP_USE cntStopUse , CNT_STOP_FACILITY_TOTAL cntStopFacilityTotal , CNT_CORRECT_ORDER cntCorrectOrder , CNT_CORRECT_INSTRUCT cntCorrectInstruct , CNT_FINE cntFine , AMT_FINE_TOTAL amtFineTotal , CNT_RECMD cntRecmd , CNT_ETC cntEtc , EVD_FILE_ID evdFileId FROM TB_EXT_ORG_ADV WHERE ADV_NO = #advNo#
sqlMap.insert:
SELECT ADVDTLID.NEXTVAL advId FROM DUAL
INSERT INTO TB_EXT_ORG_ADV ( ADV_ID , MST_LAW_ID , ADV_NO , MNG_ORG_CD , CHK_ORG_NM , CHK_NM , CHK_DT , CNT_JUDICIAL_ACT , CNT_STOP_USE , CNT_STOP_FACILITY_TOTAL , CNT_CORRECT_ORDER , CNT_CORRECT_INSTRUCT , CNT_FINE , AMT_FINE_TOTAL , CNT_RECMD , CNT_ETC , EVD_FILE_ID ) VALUES ( #advId# , #mstLawId# , #advNo# , FN_ORG_CD( #mstLawId#, #mngOrgNm#) , #chkOrgNm# , #chkNm# , TO_DATE(#chkDt#, 'YYYY.MM.DD') , #cntJudicialAct# , #cntStopUse# , #cntStopFacilityTotal# , #cntCorrectOrder# , #cntCorrectInstruct# , #cntFine# , #amtFineTotal# , #cntRecmd# , #cntEtc# , #evdFileId# )
sqlMap.update: UPDATE TB_EXT_ORG_ADV SET CHK_ORG_NM = #chkOrgNm# , CHK_NM = #chkNm# , CHK_DT = TO_DATE(#chkDt#, 'YYYY.MM.DD') , CNT_JUDICIAL_ACT = #cntJudicialAct# , CNT_STOP_USE = #cntStopUse# , CNT_STOP_FACILITY_TOTAL = #cntStopFacilityTotal# , CNT_CORRECT_ORDER = #cntCorrectOrder# , CNT_CORRECT_INSTRUCT = #cntCorrectInstruct# , CNT_FINE = #cntFine# , AMT_FINE_TOTAL = #amtFineTotal# , CNT_RECMD = #cntRecmd# , CNT_ETC = #cntEtc# WHERE ADV_NO = #advNo#
sqlMap.insert:
SELECT ADVDTLID.NEXTVAL FROM DUAL
INSERT INTO TB_EXT_ORG_ADV_DTL ( ADV_DTL_ID , ADV_DTL_SN , ADM_CD , CNT_STOP_FACILITY , AMT_FINE , ADV_DTL_TEXT , IMPR_PLAN , IMPR_RST , ORG_CD , MST_LAW_ID , BEF_FILE_ID , AFT_FILE_ID , ADV_ID ) VALUES ( #advDtlId# , (SELECT NVL(MAX(ADV_DTL_SN), 1) FROM TB_EXT_ORG_ADV_DTL WHERE ADV_ID = #advId#) , GET_CODE_BY_CODE_NM(#admNm#) , #cntStopFacility# , #amtFine# , #advDtlText# , #imprPlan# , #imprRst# , #orgCd# , #mstLawId# , #befFileId# , #aftFileId# , #advId# )
sqlMap.select: SELECT MST_LAW_ID mstLawId FROM TB_MST_LAW_TPL WHERE OPT_TIME_YEAR = #optTimeYear# AND OPT_TIME_HALF = #optTimeHalf#
